====================
**Signal Mountain Fire Guard – Jasper National Park Government Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01015598
**Solicitation Number:** 5P468-22-0193/A
**Tender Closing Date:** December 22, 2022, 16:00:00 (Mountain Standard Time)
**Bidder Type:** Competitive – Open Bidding

**Project Description:**
Parks Canada is seeking a logging contractor to undertake mechanical tree removals to establish a control line from the Keith Lakes area on Maligne Road to the southwest-facing scree slopes of Signal Mountain.

**Bid Submission Requirements:**
Bids must be submitted in accordance with the solicitation document. Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official. Due to technical limitations, Parks Canada cannot accept bids via SAP Ariba; bidders must submit their bids via fax or email as indicated in the solicitation document.

**Bidder Requirements:**
The contractor must perform and complete the work by March 15, 2023. Bidders are expected to obtain documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca). Addenda, when issued, will be available from the same source.

**Bidder Conference:**
A bidders' conference will be held on December 8, 2022, via teleconference. The conference will begin at 10:30 AM Mountain Standard Time and will cover the scope of the requirement outlined in the bid solicitation. Bidders are advised to communicate with the Contracting Authority before the conference to confirm participation and obtain dial-in coordinates.

**Enquiries:**
All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature should be submitted to the Contracting Authority in writing, allowing sufficient time for a response prior to the tender closing date.

**Additional Information:**
National Parks Regulations require that all work be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act. Bidders must ensure that their proposals comply with these regulations.
